full_summary:
**Full Colour Spectrum Image Capture System** 
=====================================

**Reference Number:** WS4013408722-Doc4023986492
**Amendment Number:** 2
**Publication Date:** June 8, 2023
**Deadline for Responses:** June 22, 2023, 2 PM EDT

The Department of Public Works and Government Services invites qualified contractors to submit proposals for a Full Colour Spectrum Image Capture System. This project aims to provide four (4) image capture suites to the Department of National Defence (DND) to support their imaging requirements.

**Key Details:**

* **Scope of Work:** The successful bidder will be required to provide a range of equipment, including computers, photo capture and editing software, chargers, cabling, maintenance tooling, ruggedized cases with internal padding, batteries, etc.
* **Expected Start Date:** June 30, 2023
* **Contract Status:** Cancelled

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
**Evaluation Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Trade Agreements:** This procurement is governed by the Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), and other applicable trade agreements.

**Regions of Opportunity:** The contract requires performance primarily within Ontario, excluding the National Capital Region.

**Regions of Delivery:** Ontario (excluding NCR)

**Contracting Entity:** The Department of Public Works and Government Services

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Malko-Moore, Shamael
* Email: [shamael.malko-moore@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:shamael.malko-moore@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: N/A
* Fax: N/A

**Notice URL:** [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16529546?extsite=MTY1Mjk1NDZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16529546?extsite=MTY1Mjk1NDZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Attachments:** N/A

Note to Bidder: Please disregard the original closing time and submit your proposal by June 26, 2023, at 2 PM EDT. Any
